channel.title: Miasmic - PK/Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER] [URL=http://"http://www.miasmic.org"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NRM14.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zqZYH.png[/img][/URL]
[B]About Us[/B] Miasmic is a RuneScape private server packed with endless quality-content. We strive to provide players with a server that not only revolves around the best times of RuneScape, but also a friendly, active community. If it's realistic player-killing, hours of content, a large variety of mini-games, or just a professional and reliable server you're looking for, Miasmic has you covered. Give it a shot, we guarantee you'll be impressed!
[B]Our Servers[/B] Our game servers are run on powerful computers with quad-core processing power. On top of that, we have incredibly fast internet speeds to go along with that power, which is why our servers have virtually no lag and 100% uptime.
[LEFT][B]Features[/B]
[ul][*]Frequent updates [*]Friendly & Active community [*]Loaded newer gfx/anims/maps/models(723 revision) [list] [*]Queen black dragon, dragon kiteshield, royal armor, ganodermic, etc. [/list] [*]Tons of minigames [list] [*]Fight Caves[*]Duel Arena[*]Fight Kiln[*]The Crucible[*]Fight Pits[*]Castle Wars[*]Dominion Tower[*]and many more! [/list] [*]Summoning [*]Hunter [*]Bonfires [*]Dicing [*]Plenty of bosses [list] [*]Queen Black Dragon [*]Corporeal Beast [*]Kalphite Queen [*]Giant Mole [*]Zaros Godwars(Nex) [*]and many more! [/list][/ul] [/LEFT]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/sdjmo5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hPaT0.png[/img] [IMG]http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m4to5dZQGu1rxo67mo1_1280.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EDSnf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N8zkJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Tvw5H.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ieaio.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bC7NV.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.miasmic.org"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Yvbo9.png[/img][/URL] [/CENTER]

item.title: Miasmic - PK/Economy
item.dc:creator: @Miasmic Miasmic
item.description:
@Miasmic wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:8, topic:453494”]Arham’s Review:

Server: Miasmic

Review: The server is undergoing a change. But this change disallows us players to log in. Please fix that. I am going to only point out the forums community:

The forums community seems very friendly. I’m sure lots of players enjoy this and they ARE mature. I like this feel. As soon as the servers back on, I’ll do another review.[/quote]

This shouldn’t be the case, I believe that I was updating the server at the time you tried to log in. Try it now and it should work, thanks for the feedback!

Read full topic

item.title: Miasmic - PK/Economy
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Arham’s Review:

Server: Miasmic

Review: The server is undergoing a change. But this change disallows us players to log in. Please fix that. I am going to only point out the forums community:

The forums community seems very friendly. I’m sure lots of players enjoy this and they ARE mature. I like this feel. As soon as the servers back on, I’ll do another review.

Read full topic

item.title: Miasmic - PK/Economy
item.dc:creator: @Miasmic Miasmic
item.description:
@Miasmic wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:6, topic:453494”]I LOVE your advertisement! I am getting on FOR SURE.

But I don’t agree with

[quote=Miasmic]
We strive to provide players with a server that not only revolves around the best times of RuneScape
[/quote][/quote]

I guess I didn’t really mean to imply that it is in that era per se, but rather that the in-game content revolves around content from that era.

Thanks for your input and feedback though!

Read full topic

item.title: Miasmic - PK/Economy
item.dc:creator: @Miasmic Miasmic
item.description:
@Miasmic wrote:

[CENTER]

About Us
Miasmic is a RuneScape private server packed with endless quality-content. We strive to provide players with a server that not only revolves around the best times of RuneScape, but also a friendly, active community. If it’s realistic player-killing, hours of content, a large variety of mini-games, or just a professional and reliable server you’re looking for, Miasmic has you covered. Give it a shot, we guarantee you’ll be impressed!

Our Servers
Our game servers are run on powerful computers with quad-core processing power. On top of that, we have incredibly fast internet speeds to go along with that power, which is why our servers have virtually no lag and 100% uptime.

[LEFT]Features

[ul][]Frequent updates
[]Friendly & Active community
[]Loaded newer gfx/anims/maps/models(723 revision)
[list]
[]Queen black dragon, dragon kiteshield, royal armor, ganodermic, etc.
[/list]
[]Tons of minigames
[list]
[]Fight Caves[]Duel Arena[]Fight Kiln[]The Crucible[]Fight Pits[]Castle Wars[]Dominion Tower[]and many more!
[/list]
[]Summoning
[]Hunter
[]Bonfires
[]Dicing
[]Plenty of bosses
[list]
[]Queen Black Dragon
[]Corporeal Beast

[]and many more!
[/list][/ul]
